cluster_relations.rel_desc: The beastly exterior is the outward appearance of the cursed prince (the Beast).
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links an outward or physical appearance to the character or entity whose appearance it is.
cluster_relations.object_entity_name: Beast (cursed prince in "Beauty and the Beast")
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Beauty and the Beast Characters and Motifs

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: while he is under the curse

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Beast (cursed prince) possesses a true inner nature distinct from his outward beastly form.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links a character or entity to their true or inner nature, distinct from outward appearance.
cluster_relations.subject_entity_name: Beast (cursed prince in "Beauty and the Beast")
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Beauty and the Beast Characters and Motifs
